snippet: Coverage of Michelle Obama and Ann Romney — and sometimes their husbands — in women’s and celebrity magazines is eagerly sought and closely watched.
abstract: Michelle Obama and Ann Romney are waging campaigns in women's and celebrity magazines to show voters their spouses' softer sides; their coverage is eagerly sought and closely watched.
lead_paragraph: Coverage of Michelle Obama and Ann Romney — and sometimes their husbands — in women’s and celebrity magazines is eagerly sought and closely watched.

headline.seo: Michelle Obama and Ann Romney Campaign in the Magazines
headline.main: Wives Take the Campaign to Newsstands
headline.print_headline: Wives Take the Campaign to Newsstands
